name: MaxWeight
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: max weight
des:
In the muscle training of big 3 (bench press, deadlift, squat),
Your possible maximum weight can be calculated from weight (kg) and number of reps.

The calculation formula is as follows.
Max weight (kg) = weight (kg) * (1 + (number of reps / conversion factor))
conversion factor=40

How to call: Alexa open max weight
Weight (x): (x) kg, (x) kilogram, weight is (x) kg
Number of reps (y): (y) times, times are (y), reps are (y)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
